customCSS: ytd-searchbox#search { width: 640px; position: absolute; left: calc(50% - 320px); margin: 0} #masthead-container.ytd-app::after { box-shadow: none !important } ytd-page-manager.ytd-app { margin-left: auto !important; margin-right: auto !important; width: 80%;}
#player { margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; } #main { width: auto !important } #top.ytd-watch { margin-top: 0px !important } #info, #meta { padding-right: 0 !important }

#masthead-container { height: 100%; display: flex; align-items: center; } #masthead-logo, #masthead-logo svg, #logo-icon-container, svg.ytd-topbar-logo-renderer { width: 272px !important; height: 92px !important; } #logo.ytd-masthead { width: auto !important; } #search-form { height: 44px; width: 484px } #container.ytd-masthead { height: auto !important; flex-direction: column !important; background: var(--yt-main-app-background); } ytd-searchbox#search { display: block; margin: 0 40px; position: relative; left: inherit; width: auto; } #end { position: absolute; top: 15px; right: 15px; } #masthead { margin-bottom: 200px }
